item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

Hello,
Thanks for reading, My question is related to case 16 317 server base.
I need to know the information for slot, does anyone have a method for obtaining this information or?

			//int item_id = inStream.readSignedWordA();//works if its the first digit.
			int item_id = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

Iâ€™ve tried several different things like this.


			int item_slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
			sM(item_slot+" "+inStream.readSignedWordA()+" "+inStream.readSignedWordA()+" "+inStream.readSignedWordA());
